column5: It's definitly a green product I always new you had to concentrate to catch musky.
Well---Is'nt that all they're good for??  Although I hear when they get between 40 and 50 lbs you can cut em into steaks and throw them on the BBQ smothered in Red Hot Sauce----
go for the carp blend next time.  it's only $1.99 a bag...
Jacques uses the Lake O Atlantic salmon blend for his apples...The results speak for themselves
I was waiting for one of you carp guys to say something...
I would buy it if they used Asian carp.
that stuff works great! I have been using it for years..It comes highly recomended from my end..
I bet it makes your garden smell terrible!
This is the proper hold for that product.
